Type.Name: StackOverflowException

TypeSignature.Value: .class public sealed serializable StackOverflowException extends System.SystemException

Type.ThreadingSafetyStatement: All public static members of this type are safe for multithreaded operations. No instance members are guaranteed to be thread safe.

summary.para: Represents the error that occurs when the execution stack overflows due to too many method calls.

block.para: is thrown for execution stack overflow errors, typically in the case of a very deep or unbounded recursion.
